SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! We escape characters based on Platform : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#) : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "\", "\\") : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "%", "%%") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"', '""') : CASE "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "$", "\$") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "`", "\`") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"', '\"') : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
! Escape double-quotes then we add double-quotes to String to preserve spaces in value : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT('"', &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#) : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"')
